name: better-auth-setup
description: Complete Better-Auth authentication setup with user profiling questions and database integration
author: Claude Code

include_profile_questions.description: Include user profiling questions after signup

auth_components.description: List of generated React auth components (LoginForm, SignupForm, ProfileQuestions, etc.)

database_schema.description: Path to database schema for users and sessions tables

auth_hooks.description: List of React hooks for auth (useAuth, useSession, useProfile)

integrations.neon-postgres: Creates users and sessions tables in database
integrations.fastapi-backend: Shares JWT tokens for API authentication

AUTH_SECRET.description: Secret key for JWT token signing (generate with: openssl rand -base64 32)

AUTH_URL.description: Base URL for auth callbacks (e.g., http://localhost:3000)
